original_text: And you shall say to them, ‘This is the nation that did not obey the voice of the Lord their God, and did not accept discipline; truth has perished; it is cut off from their lips.
korean_text: 너는 그들에게 말하기를 너희는 너희 하나님 여호와의 목소리를 순종하지 아니하며 교훈을 받지 아니하는 민족이라 진실이 없어져 너희 입에서 끊어졌다 할지니라

sentences.original_text: And you shall say to them,
that did not obey the voice of the Lord their God,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 하나님 여호와의 목소리를 청종하지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: it is cut off from their lips.
